title: Tech-Lead & Full-Stack Web developer for MLOps tools - Imaging & Sensing Technology Group
summary: We're looking for a high-energy, highly motivated Tech-Lead & Full stack web developer that will be a key member of the SW Infra & Tools team within the Imaging and Sensing organization...
description: Imagine what you could do here. At Apple, new ideas have a way of becoming extraordinary products, services, and customer experiences very quickly. Bring passion and dedication to your job...

Previous proven tech-lead / team-lead roles for Web or ML tools products / projects
7+ years of experience in SW development / similar roles
5+ years of Python and Bash programming

Deeply experienced in development for hybrid cloud environments...
education_experience: Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science or a related field
